--- Switchblade / Drag Strip / Dead-End ---

Switchblade growls, "Don't rush me," his laser welders go out, as 
he finishes fixing Speedbreakers transformation ability and patched 
up his armour somewhat. "Ok, you're done for now, but don't take 
any hits in the chest, that won't be pleasant..." he chuckles. Then 
he gets up and moves over to    Dead-End, his laser welders go on, 
again, and he continues working, this time on Dead-End. The 
unluckly bot was missing most of his arm, and parts of his side.

---------------------------

Drag Strip keeps flying, but starts to spiral upwards towards 
Incarcinator. "I'm gonna get yah, fool!" he fires again with his 
plasma cannons, preparing for another round.



On 9 May 2001, at 19:36, robertdahl wrote:

> Megatron leaps back out of Skullgrin's hands, and transforms, growing
> back to his old proportions, and lands on his feet. "Transform
> Skullgrin, and attack" he said, as he started to lift off the ground,
> and he lifted his cannon up, taking aim on the Element. Again, the
> same raw force of energy as before built up, as the force of the power
> emerging sent Megatron's feet back against the ground, as he braced
> the impact of his cannon's fury, and sent the blast of energy towards
> the Element. He then turned around as he heard familiar thrusters.
> 
> "Come onnn, hurry up Switchblade" Speedbreaker said impatiently.
>
